condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By end 2021, state actors and civil society have up-to-date descriptive and analytical information (qualitative and quantitative) on vulnerability and the different forms of disparity (socio-economic, gender, geographical)

description.narrative: UNICEF continued to support the capacity development of government actors and of the national statistics system, including through provision of technical assistance for the MICS6 survey, for which data collection was considerably delayed and only finalized at the end of 2019. In the absence of new socio-demographic data, a compilation of existing data and preliminary findings from studies and two programmatic evaluations (child protection and education) informed the situation analysis of children in Chad and the Mid-Term Review of the country programme. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:08/02/2020
